node.title: 'You are a moron': Mexican TV anchor explodes at anti-vaxxers on air
node.description: The clip has gone viral on social media.
node.content: ["A Mexican news anchor has exploded in anger on live television, saying he has had it with anti-vaxxers.", "Leonardo Schwebel earlier this week screamed at the camera \"if you're anti-vax, you're a moron. Put on a face mask\", the Independent reported.", "The clip went viral on social media with a lot of people applauding Schwebel for speaking his mind.", "\u201cSometimes you have to shout for people to get on,\u201d the Independent reported Schwebel later said. \u201cIf I had said it normally \u2014 \u2018sir, please, please, put on the mask, I ask you please, believe me,\u2019 I would not be here with you today.\u201d", "People have taken to Twitter to express their reactions to the clip."]
